title: Traditional Chinese Medicine - Harrington Chiropractic
description: Our experienced practitioners offer Traditional Chinese Medicine, including acupuncture and herbal medicine, to promote balance and wellness in the body.
cleaned_text: CONTACT US Get in touch to book your first appointment Phone 0499 844 327 admin@harringtonchiropractic.com.au Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form. At Harrington Chiropractic, we offer Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) as a natural and holistic healthcare option for our patients. TCM is a system of healthcare that includes acupuncture, herbal medicine, dietary therapy, and other modalities to promote balance and wellness in the body. Our experienced practitioners work with each patient to create an individualised treatment plan tailored to their specific needs and goals. Whether you are seeking relief from pain or stress, or looking to improve your overall health and well-being, TCM can offer a safe and effective solution. Contact us today to schedule an appointment and discover the benefits of Traditional Chinese Medicine for yourself.
